like it very good remarkable also how do i receive the other copie when i bought the portal 2 two pack please help

Lasers. Drifts. Bridges. Turrets. [b]PORTALS[/b]. 
In my opinion this game makes part of the best sequels of Valve. 
The game will help you to improve your logic skills and as soon as you finish it, you will feel like a genius just like Portal.
I played the first one and when i came to play Portal 2, this time in [b]co-op[/b] with a friend, i noticed the difference, it was awesome and entertaining and i bet you will love it because it's impossible not to.

[b]PROS:[/b]
- Funny jokes and quotes
- Great puzzles
- Great graphics
- Good story
- Good music
- Nice ambient
- Nice community (videos, fan art)
- Co-op levels
- Level editor 

A must buy if you're into [b]puzzle[/b] games.
A bit harder than the first one, which makes sense.
Anyway, you should buy Portal first though, i really recommend it.
This game is commonly on sales with a really good/low price, sometimes they have a bundle of both games.

[b]MY RATING:[/b] 10/10


[i]If you liked this review please consider giving it a thumbs up and if you disliked post in the comments on what you disliked about the review.[/i]

Portal 2. The best game ever made.

The storyline throughout Portal 2 has to be the most well-made story ever. It's a puzzle game, sure, but it's more than that.
If you're concidering buying it, stop concidering and just do it! "When life gives you lemonade, throw those lemons away and create life!".

I can't express how good this game really is. It's definitaly the best game I've played in a long, long time. How have you been?
Если жизнь одаривает вас лимонами,делайте лимонад. 10/10

It'll give you hours of fun, if you're PC gamer this is a must have

Bitirdik şükür.

Duben roku 2011, měsíc který se zapsal do dějin tím že vyšla další neskutečná hra od Valve, a to sice Portal 2, Někdo sice možná očekával half life, ale čekněme si na rovinu, Gaben má strach z čísla 3, takže možná někdy jindy! Hra vás hodí do misí které se nezkutečně ztěžují, ale není to tak že by to nešlo projít po pár hodinách hraní. Po singleplayeru si připadáte neskutečně chytře a tak si řeknete že si to zahrajete s nějakým z vaších falešných kamarádů a budete největší skill a pořešíte to prakticky v jednom a ukážete mu, kdo tady velí a kdo má větší IQ! Obtíž nastane u druhé mise kde nejste schopni pochopit že prostě kouli na hranatý čudlík dát nemůžete, dokonce ani když na něm stojí jak koule tak vaše loutka. A tak začíná již druhá strastiplná cesta, tentokrát s vaším jemně mentálně narušeným kamarádem. Po dokončení první, dejme tomu sekvence, si už chcete vyměnit parťáka za někoho s mozkem, nebo někoho kdo aspoň rozumí tomu co má dělat když jen nečinně stojí v rohu místnosti, kouká na vás a pojídá si za svým monitorem špagety. Tudíž nastává asi to nejtěžší v celém portálu, kam se na to hrabou hádanky nejtěžších levelů, teď musíte nějak hezky vysvětlit, že s tím kokotem už prostě hrát nebudete a že by jste ho vyměnili i za kus sýra. Poté co jste vyměnili parťáka zjišťujete, že se nedokážete dostat ani ke dveřím které se odemkli v hlavní místnosti. Znechucením vypínáte hru, kterou zapínáte po více jak roce. Samozřejmě že si řeknete:"Však musejí být vyjímky, kteří to nezapnou nikdy už ne?". A ano, máte pravdu  i tací se jistě najdou. Každopádně hru bych shrnul jako velice povedenou, příběh tam dle mého názoru není až tak uplně hlavní věc proč tu hru hrajete, ale samozřejmě je to skvělé zpříjemnění. Zpracování na tu dobu famózní. Na co-op si také nemůžu stěžovat, nikdy s ničím nebyl problém, jediný problém byl vždy mezi monitorem a židlí. Nemůžu nic víc než doporučit :)
muito bom melhor jogo de puzzle que já joguei

This game really grabs you and doesn't let you go, and when stuck on a puzzle, you find yourself sitting for long periods trying all the solutions you can think of, only to find that all logical conclutions you came to were wrong and you had to stumble apon clues and eventually the answer. This isn''t always the case but the game just get's smarter and harder and i loved it. The characters and story are what made 50% of the game's success as well, and its definitely worth it. the puzzles make the game very long and make you think quite a bit out of your usual daily problem solving.
Ki jön coopozni? Aki jön jelölön be!

If you listened, then you can see that this is what a true sequel should be.

Einzigartiges Spielprinzip und eine sehr witzige Story. Ich kann jedem der Rätselspiele mag Portal 2 (am besten im Bundle mit Portal 1, da die Story fortgeführt wird) mit seinem innovativen sowie kreativen Inhalt nur empfehlen.

Portal 3 kann kommen. Am besten im Bundle mit Half Life³ und VR Support.

Wem die Rätsel in Portal 2 nicht genügen / zu leicht sind kann auch noch auf die kostenlose Mod "Portal Stories: Mel" zurückgreifen.

Really good game, fun and entertaining.
Suggested to everybody
Brain burner 2007 edition. 10/10
You thought that portal 1 could not get better. you thought that the crazy puzzles could not get crazier. you thought that glados could not get more maniacal. you were wrong...

Tout a été génial, tant sur le fond que sur la forme.
Les personnages au dialogues mémorable, un sénario
très bien écrit.

Un Excelente Juego, independiente de los fallos que tenga, cabe destacar el multijugador a pantalla partida altamente satisfactoria en consola, es realmente una experiencia emocionante, la evolución de personajes en comparación con la primera entrega actúan como formula perfecta para integrar al jugador en la historia, como jugador quedas con hambre de saber mas acerca de Aperture y su historia, sus inicios y sus efectos en su diegesis.

Es un gran juego que te entretiene y absorbe en su atmósfera de misterios y te da a entender que es un universo por descubrir.
Overall this is a great puzzle game with an intriguing coop aspect and a thrilling story. Definitely worth the money.

Sequels, as a rule, are not as good as their originals, not as memorable, not as well-crafted, not as well-received. All that is definitely untrue about Portal 2. In my mind, it takes the mood, atmosphere, wit and fun of the original Portal game to a whole 'nother level. I was hooked from the moment I dropped myself into the shattered glass room I'd started in the original game, water closet and radio and all. From there, it's gotten better and better. A truly awesome experience! 

Do I recommend this game? Yes, enthusiastically!
优秀的游戏，卓越的游戏

10/10

Definitely worth a buy. A puzzle game mixed with a FPS that will leave you wanting more. Humor and graphics are A+.

Ahhhh yes, those orange and blue windows of hope. Those apertures (hehehe) of glory. Those wonderful openings of transported-ness. Portal. Portal 2 is well worth the money! I played through the Single Player in about 8 hours. The SP isn't really that replayable, BUT, that's what the workshop and level creator is for! There is also a Co-op, which can be played online, or split screen with some controllers. (There's a program called DS4 that lets you use PS4 controllers on Windows) Anyway, back on track. Portal brings GREAT humor in the form (mostly) Wheatly and Cave Johnson. I won't spoil anything, but they ARE hilarious. Not many games make you laugh, but this one does. You will not regret getting this game!
It was a pretty decent game I'd say

Everyone who owns a PC should play this masterpiece.
Especially co-operatively!
Güzel bir oyun, indirmede iken alınabilir.

I love this game, I've already beat it 3 times and right now I'm playing co-op with my friend, so far its been AMAZING. I love the way GLaDOS looks in portal 2 compared to portal. I've still been surprised on how well the story is, no lie. The complex puzzles are great, and especially all the co-op levels.. GLaDOS' comments on how your doing 'n' stuff are great and makes the game feel like your a person in an actual lab with a mind controlling robot that wants to constantly kill you.

edit: now at 124 hours and ive beat the game countless times but my opinion has not changed.
What I liked or disliked

Secuela FLIPANTE del primer portal, es demasiado increible, el humor, la historia, todo lo que ocurre en sí. Este juego es de lo mejor que he podido jugar, me flipo con poco, lo se, pero madre mia. Que sin darme cuenta me lo había terminado, y mira mis horas de juego.

El modo cooperativo es de lo mejorcito, unas risas increibles con los troleos entre amigos.
En fin 10/10, se podria hacer un poquito repetitivo, y algunos puzzles telita. Pero cuando los pasas vale la pena
